column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I appreciate your remarks on the "unjustness" of competition within the restaurant industry. However
column2: I'm not sure I fully understand how (or why) you're comparing two wholly different Asian cultures that have developed two vastly different versions of broth and noodles. To me
column3: comparing Vietnamese pho and Japanese ramen is like comparing a burrito to a spring roll. I think the differences in pho and ramen speak for themselves.
